attributes.action: Not instigate the use of speed limiters to Motorcycles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The introduction of any device which could take away the engine control of any MOTORCYCLE and will not help reduce accidents but could infact cause more accidents. Motorcyclists need FULL control over the throttle of thier machine to be in complete control. If this is taken away (electronicaly or mechanicaly) the motorcyclist then has only limited control which could result in Death or Injury to themselves or other road users or pedestrians.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
